column1: maxine m. behrendt| maxine m. behrendt. born: january 18
column8: 2015 at the ottawa county health center
column10: 1925 in delphos to clarence l. and helen marie (clark) parker. she was a 1943 graduate of minneapolis high school. maxine was united in marriage with robert bob otto behrendt on april 9
column11: 1944. they lived in minneapolis. she helped bob with the farming. in 1953
column12: they managed the minneapolis hatchery until 1962. later in 1962 maxine went to work for the ottawa county bank and later the united bank for a total of 21 years. she enjoyed being a member of the chamberettes
column15: and the presbyterian women. maxine also enjoyed playing cards. maxine was a member of the first presbyterian church where she served as a deacon
column17: and elder. she was preceded in death by her parents and her husband bob on april 1
column18: 2014. survivors include her children james max behrendt and his wife gloria and karalee austin and her husband tom all of minneapolis; sister evelyn atwell of minneapolis; brother leland parker and his wife shirley of auburn
column19: in; five grandchildren; and 15 great-grandchildren. funeral services will be 11:00 a. m.
column21: june 13 at the first presbyterian church
column22: minneapolis. the family will receive friends an hour before the service in the church library. friends may call at the wilson family funeral home from 1:00 p. m. to 5:00 p. m. friday. burial will be in highland cemetery
column23: minneapolis. in lieu of flowers memorials may be made to the church. send sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
